record.author: POLLEX 2000 (Bruce Biggs & Ross Clark)
record.classification: Austronesian, Malayo-Polynesian, Central-Eastern Malayo-Polynesian, Eastern Malayo-Polynesian, Oceanic, Central-Eastern Oceanic, Remote Oceanic, Central Pacific, East Fijian-Polynesian, Polynesian, Nuclear, Samoic-Outlier, Ellicean

record.annotation: Pollex 06: Ui. :TaKe a direction, turn, go (all involving choice from several options) (Nks).
Belly, seat of the emotions, entrails (Bsr)
Think, have an idea, have an opinion (Rby)
Pollex 06: Tu/tuli/. :Hunt; be sent away by someone who dislikes you.
To cut, break (of string), be separated
come into leaf, sprout (of coconut from husk.(Rby)
Pollex 06: Pei. :Break coconut, head, canoe, cup (Rby); cast, toss, throw (Bsr).
Pollex 06: Fua. :Fruit, egg, testicle, bear fruit
Rotten (of tree, house, canoe, fruit etc.) (Rby)
Term for about fifteen kinds of grass (Rby)
Sauce of salt-water, coconut cream and onions (Bsr)
Thick; third night of the moon (Rby)
First person dual exclusive subject and possessive preposed pronoun (Rby)
We, our (inclusive) plural preverbal and posessive form) (Rby)
Second person plural pronoun in nucleus of the phrase (Ply)
Negative; to be not the case (Rby)
One hundred bonito or nuts (Rby), a hundred of anything (Fny).(Source: Pollex)
